replies.author: 神哥丿
replies.txt_content:
标题: [管理|聊天|综合|修正]SignInColors ————彩色木牌[1.8-1.10]什么是SignInColors呢？
SignInColors是一款可以在木牌上编辑彩色字体和变量的插件

                                  图片
输入

下载附件

2016-12-25 16:10 上传






                                    变量

variable        line        description
<player>        0-3        The variable will be changed to your name
<time>        0-3        The variable will be changed to the amount of the ticks in your world
<location>        0        Line 0 will be changed to the world name and line 1-3 will be changed to your X,Y,Z
<online>        0-3        The variable will be changed to the amount of the online players
[SoupInv]        0        The line will be changed to the soupinv prefix and when the player right clicks the sign it opens a soup inv
<faction>        0-3        The line will be changed to the player's faction name

 变量 行数 说明<player>0-3 显示玩家名<time>0-3显示服务时间<location>0这个告示牌的坐标<online>0-3在线玩家数量[SoupInv]0不明<faction>0-3玩家权限组名

                              权限
signcolorseditor - signincolors.editor - Main SignInColors Editor command.
reloadsignconfig- signincolors.reload - Reloads the config.
Use chatcolors in signs - signincolors.use
Use chatcolors in chat - signincolors.chat
To use the soupinv the player must have the permission - signincolors.soup

signincolors.editor 颜色/变量的权限signincolors.reload重载插件的权限signincolors.use告示牌颜色的权限signincolors.chat聊天颜色的权限signincolors.soup[SoupInv]的权限

PS:这个插件那已经有很多人搬运了我呢看他更新了1.10所以我就顺手把它给搬了过来距离下一个没有更新已经有两个月这样子了于是我就搬运过来了应该符合版规吧!草稿这些也不容易啊


[fly]希望能给点人气表示支持~[/fly]
